text: Ritiševo (Serbian Cyrillic: Ритишево, Romanian: Râtișor) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Vršac municipality, in the South Banat District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Romanian ethnic majority (72.10%) and its population numbering 496 people (2011 census). ==See also== *List of populated places in Serbia **List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Serbian Banat Category:Populated places in South Banat District Category:Vršac Category:Romanian communities in Serbia
title: Ritiševo
